title: I want to reset my pixel 2, but I'm worried it will mess with the data on my pixel 4.
content: I upgraded from a pixel 2 to a pixel 4 xl and I want to reset my pixel 2 so I can sell it. I worried that resetting my pixel 2 will mess with my account on my pixel 4 xl since my accounts were the same. The pixel 2 doesn't have a Sim card in it and my pixel 4 xl does. Should I be worried about resetting my phone?
